trans-unit.source: Defines the contract that ASP.NET implements to provide membership services using custom membership providers.
trans-unit.target: 定義 ASP.NET 為使用成員資格提供者提供成員資格服務實作的合約。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET membership is designed to enable you to easily use a number of different membership providers for your ASP.NET applications.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 成員資格被為了讓您輕鬆地為您的 ASP.NET 應用程式使用許多不同的成員資格提供者。

trans-unit.source: You can use the supplied membership providers that are included with the .NET Framework, or you can implement your own provider.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用隨附於.NET Framework 中，提供成員資格提供者，或者您可以實作自己的提供者。

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980) before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不熟悉的 ASP.NET 成員資格功能，請參閱[成員資格簡介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980)才能繼續。

trans-unit.source: For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd).
trans-unit.target: 如需與成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱[使用成員資格管理使用者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。

trans-unit.source: When implementing a custom membership provider, you are required to inherit the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 在實作自訂成員資格提供者時，您需要繼承<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: There are two primary reasons for creating a custom membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 有兩個主要的原因，建立自訂成員資格提供者。

trans-unit.source: You need to store membership information in a data source that is not supported by the membership providers included with the .NET Framework, such as a FoxPro database, an Oracle database, or other data source.
trans-unit.target: 您要將成員資格資訊儲存在.NET Framework 中，例如 FoxPro 資料庫、 Oracle 資料庫或其他資料來源所包含的成員資格提供者不支援的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: You need to manage membership information using a database schema that is different from the database schema used by the providers that ship with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 您要管理使用不同於.NET Framework 所隨附的提供者所使用的資料庫結構描述的資料庫結構描述的成員資格資訊。

trans-unit.source: A common example of this would be membership data that already exists in a SQL Server database for a company or Web site.
trans-unit.target: 常見的範例會在公司或網站的 SQL Server 資料庫中已存在的成員資格資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> abstract class inherits from the <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>抽象類別繼承自<xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase>抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementations must also implement the required members of <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> 實作也必須實作的必要的成員<xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You are not required to implement a constructor for a class that inherits the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要實作繼承的類別的建構函式<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: Initialization values for a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation are passed to the <xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Initialize%2A> method implementation.
trans-unit.target: 初始化值<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作會傳遞至<xref:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Initialize%2A>方法實作。

trans-unit.source: The name of the application using the custom membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用自訂成員資格提供者的應用程式名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the application using the custom membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用自訂成員資格提供者的應用程式名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property value is stored in the data source with related user information to associate a user with a particular application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ApplicationName%2A>屬性值會儲存在使用者與特定應用程式的相關的使用者資訊的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: This property is read/write and defaults to the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath%2A> property value if not specified explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是讀取/寫入，且預設值為<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath%2A>如果未指定明確的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Because membership providers store user information uniquely for each application, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same data source without running into a conflict if duplicate user names are created.
trans-unit.target: 成員資格提供者儲存獨有的每個應用程式的使用者資訊，因為多個 ASP.NET 應用程式可以使用相同的資料來源不會發生衝突，如果建立了重複的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user data source by specifying the same <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ApplicationName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 或者，多個 ASP.NET 應用程式可以使用相同的使用者資料來源藉由指定相同<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ApplicationName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: In your membership provider implementation, you will need to ensure that your data schema includes the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ApplicationName%2A> and that data source queries and updates also include the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ApplicationName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在成員資格提供者實作中，您必須確認您的資料結構描述中包含<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ApplicationName%2A>和資料來源查詢與更新也包含<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ApplicationName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: The user to update the password for.
trans-unit.target: 要更新密碼的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The current password for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 指定之使用者的目前密碼。

trans-unit.source: The new password for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 指定之使用者的新密碼。

trans-unit.source: Processes a request to update the password for a membership user.
trans-unit.target: 處理要求，以更新成員資格使用者的密碼。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the password was updated successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果密碼更新成功，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Takes, as input, a user name, a current password, and a new password, and updates the password in the data source if the supplied user name and current password are valid.
trans-unit.target: 接受輸入使用者名稱、 目前的密碼、 和新的密碼，並更新資料來源中的密碼，如果提供的使用者名稱和目前的密碼有效。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: The user to change the password question and answer for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其變更密碼問題和解答的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The password for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 指定之使用者的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The new password question for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 指定之使用者的新密碼問題。

trans-unit.source: The new password answer for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 指定之使用者的新密碼解答。

trans-unit.source: Processes a request to update the password question and answer for a membership user.
trans-unit.target: 處理要求，以更新成員資格使用者的密碼問題和解答。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the password question and answer are updated successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果密碼問題和解答已順利更新，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Takes, as input, a user name, a password, a password question and a password answer, and updates the password question and answer in the data source if the supplied user name and password are valid.
trans-unit.target: 接受輸入使用者名稱、 密碼、 密碼問題和密碼解答，並更新的密碼問題和解答，資料來源中的，如果提供的使用者名稱和密碼有效。

trans-unit.source: If the supplied user name and password are not valid, `false` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的使用者名稱和密碼不正確，`false`傳回。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: The user name for the new user.
trans-unit.target: 新使用者的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The password for the new user.
trans-unit.target: 新使用者的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The email address for the new user.
trans-unit.target: 新使用者的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: The password question for the new user.
trans-unit.target: 新使用者的密碼問題。

trans-unit.source: The password answer for the new user
trans-unit.target: 新使用者的密碼解答。

trans-unit.source: Whether or not the new user is approved to be validated.
trans-unit.target: 新的使用者是否核准為通過驗證。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier from the membership data source for the user.
trans-unit.target: 使用者成員資格資料來源中的唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus" /> enumeration value indicating whether the user was created successfully.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus" /> 列舉值，指出使用者是否已成功建立。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new membership user to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 將新成員資格使用者加入資料來源。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> object populated with the information for the newly created user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> 物件，其中填入新建立使用者的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Takes, as input, the name of a new user, a password, and an email address and inserts a new user for the application into the data source.
trans-unit.target: 做為輸入，接受新的使用者、 密碼及電子郵件地址的名稱，並將新的使用者應用程式插入至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> object populated with the information for the newly created user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>填入新建立的使用者資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method also defines an `out` parameter (in Visual Basic, you can use `ByRef`) that returns a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus> value that indicates that the user was successfully created, or a reason that user creation failed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>方法也會定義`out`參數 (在 Visual Basic 中，您可以使用`ByRef`) 傳回<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus>值，表示已成功建立使用者，或該的使用者建立失敗的原因。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event, if a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipValidatePasswordEventHandler> event handler has been specified, and continues or cancels the create-user action based on the results of the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>方法會引發<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>事件，如果<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipValidatePasswordEventHandler>事件處理常式已指定，並繼續執行或取消事件的結果為基礎建立使用者的動作。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.OnValidatingPassword%2A> virtual method to execute the specified <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipValidatePasswordEventHandler> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.OnValidatingPassword%2A>虛擬方法，執行指定<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipValidatePasswordEventHandler>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the encrypted password to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: 包含要解密之已加密密碼的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts an encrypted password.
trans-unit.target: 解密加密的密碼。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the decrypted password.
trans-unit.target: 包含已解密之密碼的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.DecryptPassword%2A> method is a virtual method that is provided for membership provider implementations to use when supporting encrypted password formats.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.DecryptPassword%2A>方法是虛擬的方法所提供的成員資格提供者實作支援時所要使用加密密碼的格式。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey" /> property or <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DecryptionKey" /> property is set to <see langword="AutoGenerate" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.ValidationKey" /> 屬性或 <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.DecryptionKey" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="AutoGenerate" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is not available.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法使用。

trans-unit.source: This can occur if the application targets the [!INCLUDE[net_client_v40_long](~/includes/net-client-v40-long-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式是以 [!INCLUDE[net_client_v40_long](~/includes/net-client-v40-long-md.md)] 為目標，就會發生這個情況。

trans-unit.source: To prevent this exception, override the method, or change the application to target the full version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個例外狀況，請覆寫方法，或將應用程式變更為以完整版本的 .NET Framework 為目標。

trans-unit.source: The name of the user to delete.
trans-unit.target: 要刪除的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to delete data related to the user from the database; <see langword="false" /> to leave data related to the user in the database.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要從資料庫中刪除與使用者相關的資料，<see langword="false" /> 表示要保留資料庫中與使用者相關的資料。

trans-unit.source: Removes a user from the membership data source.
trans-unit.target: 從成員資格資料來源中移除使用者。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user was successfully deleted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功刪除使用者，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Takes, as input, the name of a user and deletes that user's information from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 做為輸入，接受使用者的名稱，並從資料來源中刪除該使用者的資訊。

trans-unit.source: If `deleteAllRelatedData` is `true`, then all user data stored in the database for the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> personalization is also deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`deleteAllRelatedData`是`true`，然後儲存的所有使用者資料的資料庫中<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>， <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>個人化也會一併刪除。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the membership provider is configured to allow users to reset their passwords.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否將成員資格提供者設定成可讓使用者重設其密碼。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the membership provider supports password reset; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成員資格提供者支援密碼重設，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EnablePasswordReset%2A> contains a Boolean value specified in the configuration file (Web.config) using the `enablePasswordReset` attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EnablePasswordReset%2A> 包含布林值，指定在組態檔 (Web.config) 中使用`enablePasswordReset`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value indicates whether users can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> method to overwrite their current password with a new, randomly generated password.
trans-unit.target: 值，指出使用者是否可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A>方法隨機產生的新密碼以覆寫其目前的密碼。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the membership provider is configured to allow users to retrieve their passwords.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否將成員資格提供者設定成可讓使用者擷取其密碼。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the membership provider is configured to support password retrieval; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果將成員資格提供者設定成可支援密碼擷取，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EnablePasswordRetrieval%2A> property contains a Boolean value specified in the configuration file (Web.config) using the `enablePasswordRetrieval` attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EnablePasswordRetrieval%2A>屬性包含布林值，指定在組態檔 (Web.config) 中使用`enablePasswordRetrieval`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value indicates whether users can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A> method to retrieve their current password from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 值，指出使用者是否可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A>方法來從資料來源擷取其目前的密碼。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: If your custom membership provider supports hashed passwords, your <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A> method implementation should throw an exception if <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EnablePasswordRetrieval%2A> is set to `true` and the password format is set to `Hashed`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的自訂成員資格提供者支援雜湊的密碼，您<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A>方法實作應擲回例外狀況，如果<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EnablePasswordRetrieval%2A>設`true`和密碼格式設定為`Hashed`。

trans-unit.source: Hashed passwords cannot be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 無法擷取雜湊的密碼。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

trans-unit.source: The email address to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: The index of the page of results to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的結果頁面索引。

trans-unit.source: <c>pageIndex</c> is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: <c>pageIndex</c> 以零為起始。

trans-unit.source: The size of the page of results to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的結果頁面大小。

trans-unit.source: The total number of matched users.
trans-unit.target: 相符的使用者總數。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of membership users where the email address contains the specified email address to match.
trans-unit.target: 取得成員資格使用者集合，其中電子郵件地址包含要符合的指定電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection" /> collection that contains a page of <paramref name="pageSize" /><see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> objects beginning at the page specified by <paramref name="pageIndex" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含一頁 <paramref name="pageSize" /><see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection" /> 集合，從 <paramref name="pageIndex" /> 指定的頁面開始。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> returns a list of membership users where the user's email address matches the supplied `emailToMatch` for the configured <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> 傳回成員資格使用者的清單，其中使用者的電子郵件地址符合所提供`emailToMatch`設定<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ApplicationName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If your data source supports additional search capabilities, such as wildcard characters, you can provide more extensive search capabilities for email addresses.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的資料來源支援其他的搜尋功能，例如萬用字元，您可以提供更廣泛的搜尋功能的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: The results returned by <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的結果<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。

trans-unit.source: The `pageSize` parameter identifies the number of <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> objects to return in the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: `pageSize`參數識別的號碼<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>物件中傳回<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return where 0 identifies the first page.
trans-unit.target: `pageIndex`參數識別要傳回其中 0 識別的第一頁的結果的頁面。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of membership users that matched the `emailToMatch` value.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為相符的成員資格使用者總數`emailToMatch`值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if 13 users were found where `emailToMatch` matched part of or the entire email address, and the `pageIndex` value was 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> would contain the sixth through the tenth users returned.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果 13 找不到使用者的位置`emailToMatch`比對的一部分或整個電子郵件地址，而`pageIndex`值為 1 以`pageSize`5，則<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection>會包含第 6 到傳回的第十個使用者。

trans-unit.source: `totalRecords` would be set to 13.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords` 會設定為 13。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: If your data source supports additional search capabilities, such as wildcard characters, you can provide more extensive search capabilities for user names.

trans-unit.source: The results returned by <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的結果<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。

trans-unit.source: The `pageSize` parameter identifies the number of <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> objects to return in the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: `pageSize`參數識別的號碼<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>物件中傳回<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where 0 identifies the first page.
trans-unit.target: `pageIndex`參數識別要傳回，其中 0 識別的第一頁的結果的頁面。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of membership users that matched the `usernameToMatch` value.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為相符的成員資格使用者總數`usernameToMatch`值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if 13 users were found where `usernameToMatch` matched part of or the entire user name, and the `pageIndex` value was 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> would contain the sixth through the tenth users returned.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果 13 找不到使用者的位置`usernameToMatch`比對的一部分或整個使用者名稱，而`pageIndex`值為 1 以`pageSize`5，則<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection>會包含第 6 到傳回的第十個使用者。

trans-unit.source: `totalRecords` would be set to 13.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords` 會設定為 13。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection" /> collection that contains a page of <paramref name="pageSize" /><see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> objects beginning at the page specified by <paramref name="pageIndex" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含一頁 <paramref name="pageSize" /><see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection" /> 集合，從 <paramref name="pageIndex" /> 指定的頁面開始。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> returns a list of all of the users from the data source for the configured <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> 已設定資料來源傳回的所有使用者清單<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ApplicationName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Users are returned in alphabetical order by user name.
trans-unit.target: 依使用者名稱以字母順序傳回使用者。

trans-unit.source: The results returned by <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的結果<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。

trans-unit.source: The `pageSize` parameter identifies the number of <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> objects to return in the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: `pageSize`參數識別的號碼<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>物件中傳回<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where 0 identifies the first page.
trans-unit.target: `pageIndex`參數識別要傳回，其中 0 識別的第一頁的結果的頁面。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of membership users in the database.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為資料庫中的成員資格使用者總數。

trans-unit.source: For example, if there are 13 users in the database, and the `pageIndex` value was 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> would contain the sixth through the tenth users returned.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果在資料庫中，有 13 的使用者和`pageIndex`值為 1 以`pageSize`5，則<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection>會包含第 6 到傳回的第十個使用者。

trans-unit.source: `totalRecords` would be set to 13.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords` 會設定為 13。

trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of users currently accessing the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前存取應用程式的使用者數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of users currently accessing the application.
trans-unit.target: 目前存取應用程式的使用者數目。

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer value that is the count of all the users in the data source where the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> is greater than the current date and time minus the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.UserIsOnlineTimeWindow%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回整數值的資料來源中的所有使用者計數其中<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>大於目前的日期和時間減去<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.UserIsOnlineTimeWindow%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.UserIsOnlineTimeWindow%2A> is a positive integer value specifying the number of minutes to use when determining whether a user is online.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.UserIsOnlineTimeWindow%2A>正整數值，指定時要使用的分鐘數判斷使用者是否已上線。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: The user to retrieve the password for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其擷取密碼的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The password answer for the user.
trans-unit.target: 使用者的密碼解答。

trans-unit.source: Gets the password for the specified user name from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源取得指定使用者名稱的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The password for the specified user name.
trans-unit.target: 受指定使用者的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Takes, as input, a user name and a password answer and retrieves the password for that user from the data source and returns the password as a string.
trans-unit.target: 接受輸入使用者名稱和密碼解答和從資料來源擷取該使用者的密碼並將密碼當做字串傳回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A> method ensures that the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EnablePasswordRetrieval%2A> flag is set to `true` before performing any action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A>方法可確保<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EnablePasswordRetrieval%2A>旗標設為`true`然後再執行任何動作。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EnablePasswordRetrieval%2A> is `false`, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EnablePasswordRetrieval%2A>是`false`、<xref:System.NotSupportedException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A> also checks the value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A> 也會檢查值<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A> checks the value of the supplied answer parameter against the stored password answer in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A>是`true`，<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A>會檢查提供的回應參數與資料來源中的預存的密碼解答的值。

trans-unit.source: If they do not match, a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果不相符，<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If your custom membership provider supports hashed passwords, the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A> method should throw an exception if the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EnablePasswordRetrieval%2A> property is set to `true` and the password format is set to `Hashed`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的自訂成員資格提供者支援雜湊的密碼，<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A>方法應該擲回例外狀況，如果<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EnablePasswordRetrieval%2A>屬性設定為`true`和密碼格式設定為`Hashed`。

trans-unit.source: Hashed passwords cannot be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 無法擷取雜湊的密碼。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: Gets information from the data source for a membership user.
trans-unit.target: 從成員資格使用者的資料來源取得資訊。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the membership user to get information for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其取得資訊的成員資格使用者之唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to update the last-activity date/time stamp for the user; <see langword="false" /> to return user information without updating the last-activity date/time stamp for the user.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要更新使用者的最後活動日期/時間戳記，<see langword="false" /> 表示在不更新使用者的最後活動日期/時間戳記的情況下傳回使用者資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets user information from the data source based on the unique identifier for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: 根據成員資格使用者的唯一識別碼，從資料來源取得使用者資訊。

trans-unit.source: Provides an option to update the last-activity date/time stamp for the user.
trans-unit.target: 提供選項，以更新使用者之上次活動日期/時間戳記。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> object populated with the specified user's information from the data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> 物件，其中填入來自資料來源之指定的使用者資訊。

trans-unit.source: Takes, as input, a unique identifier for a user record and a Boolean value indicating whether to update the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> value for the user to show that the user is currently online.
trans-unit.target: 做為輸入，採用使用者記錄和布林值，指出是否要更新的唯一識別碼<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>使用者以顯示使用者是目前在線上的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> object populated with current values from the data source for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>填入目前的值，指定使用者資料來源的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the user name is not found in the data source, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源中找不到使用者名稱<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the user to get information for.
trans-unit.target: 要取得資訊的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to update the last-activity date/time stamp for the user; <see langword="false" /> to return user information without updating the last-activity date/time stamp for the user.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要更新使用者的最後活動日期/時間戳記，<see langword="false" /> 表示在不更新使用者的最後活動日期/時間戳記的情況下傳回使用者資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets information from the data source for a user.
trans-unit.target: 從使用者的資料來源取得資訊。

trans-unit.source: Provides an option to update the last-activity date/time stamp for the user.
trans-unit.target: 提供選項，以更新使用者之上次活動日期/時間戳記。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> object populated with the specified user's information from the data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> 物件，其中填入來自資料來源之指定的使用者資訊。

trans-unit.source: Takes, as input, a user name and a Boolean value indicating whether to update the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> property value for the user to show that the user is currently online.
trans-unit.target: 輸入使用者名稱和布林值，指出是否要更新的時間越長，<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>使用者以顯示使用者是目前在線上的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> returns a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> object populated with current values from the data source for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> 傳回<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>填入目前的值，指定使用者資料來源的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the user name is not found in the data source, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源中找不到使用者名稱<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: The email address to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: Gets the user name associated with the specified email address.
trans-unit.target: 取得與所指定電子郵件地址建立關聯的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The user name associated with the specified email address.
trans-unit.target: 與所指定電子郵件地址建立關聯的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: If no match is found, return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到符合的項目，會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Takes, as input, an email address and returns the first user name from the data source where the email address matches the supplied `email` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 做為輸入，接受電子郵件地址，並傳回其中電子郵件地址符合所提供的資料來源中的第一個使用者名稱`email`參數值。

trans-unit.source: If no user name is found with a matching email address, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有使用者名稱找不到相符的電子郵件地址，`null`傳回。

trans-unit.source: If multiple user names are found that match a particular email address, only the first user name found should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到符合特定電子郵件地址的多個使用者名稱，則應該傳回只的第一個使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can implement a custom mechanism for ensuring a unique email address for each user name such as the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.RequiresUniqueEmail%2A> property supported by the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> provider.
trans-unit.target: 您可以實作自訂的機制，可確保每個使用者名稱的唯一電子郵件地址，例如<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider.RequiresUniqueEmail%2A>屬性支援<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>提供者。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of invalid password or password-answer attempts allowed before the membership user is locked out.
trans-unit.target: 取得鎖定成員資格使用者以前，所允許的無效密碼或密碼解答嘗試次數。

trans-unit.source: The number of invalid password or password-answer attempts allowed before the membership user is locked out.
trans-unit.target: 鎖定成員資格使用者以前，所允許的無效密碼或密碼解答嘗試次數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> property works in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A> property to guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>屬性可搭配<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A>屬性，以防範不必要的來源，破解的密碼或密碼解答的成員資格使用者，透過重複嘗試。

trans-unit.source: If the number of invalid passwords or password questions supplied for a membership user is greater than or equal to the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> property value within the number of minutes identified by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A>, then the membership user is locked out by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A> property to `true` until the user is unlocked by a call to the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UnlockUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果的無效密碼或提供成員資格使用者的密碼問題數目大於或等於<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>屬性值所識別的分鐘數內<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A>，然後藉由設定鎖定成員資格使用者<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>屬性`true`直到呼叫解除鎖定使用者<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UnlockUser%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If a valid password or password answer is supplied before the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> value is reached, the counter that tracks the number of invalid attempts is reset to zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供有效的密碼或密碼解答之前<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>到達值時，追蹤無效嘗試次數的計數器就會重設為零。

trans-unit.source: Invalid password and password-answer attempts accumulate independently of one another.
trans-unit.target: 無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試累積彼此獨立。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> property is set to 5, and three invalid password attempts are made followed by two invalid password-answer attempts, two more invalid password attempts (or three more invalid password-answer attempts) must be made within the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A> for the membership user to be locked out.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>屬性設定為 5，而且後面接著兩個無效的密碼解答嘗試進行三個無效的密碼嘗試次數，內，則必須進行兩個的多個無效的密碼嘗試次數（或三個的多個無效的密碼解答嘗試）<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A>被鎖定成員資格使用者。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A> property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A>屬性設定為`false`，不會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試。

trans-unit.source: Invalid password and password-answer attempts are tracked in the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePasswordQuestionAndAnswer%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 在中，追蹤無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePasswordQuestionAndAnswer%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum number of special characters that must be present in a valid password.
trans-unit.target: 取得有效的密碼中必須要有的特殊字元數目下限。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of special characters that must be present in a valid password.
trans-unit.target: 有效的密碼中必須要有的特殊字元數目下限。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A> property returns the minimum number of special, non-alphabetic characters that must be entered to create a valid password for the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>屬性會傳回必須輸入要建立的有效密碼的特殊、 非字母字元的最小數目<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A> property value is set in the application configuration using the `minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>屬性值會設定在應用程式組態中，使用`minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)組態項目。

trans-unit.source: A non-alphanumeric character is a character for which the <xref:System.Char.IsLetterOrDigit%2A> method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 非英數字元是字元的<xref:System.Char.IsLetterOrDigit%2A>方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)中的組態項目`system.web`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: It specifies that the application use an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> class to provide membership services, and sets the `minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters` attribute to 1 character.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>類別提供成員資格服務與集`minRequiredNonalphanumericCharacters`屬性設為 1 個字元。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum length required for a password.
trans-unit.target: 取得密碼所需的最小長度。

trans-unit.source: The minimum length required for a password.
trans-unit.target: 密碼所需的最小長度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A> property gets the minimum number of characters that must be entered to create a valid password for the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>屬性會取得必須輸入要建立的有效密碼的字元數目下限<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A> property value is set in the application configuration using the `minRequiredPasswordLength` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>屬性值會設定在應用程式組態中，使用`minRequiredPasswordLength`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)組態項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)中的組態項目`system.web`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: It specifies that the application use an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> class to provide membership services, and sets the `minRequiredPasswordLength` attribute to seven characters.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>類別提供成員資格服務與集`minRequiredPasswordLength`屬性設定為七個字元。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs" /> to pass to the <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword" /> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs" /> 事件處理常式的 <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword" /> event if an event handler has been defined.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經定義事件處理常式，就會引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.OnValidatingPassword%2A> virtual method is used during the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> methods to raise the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event if a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipValidatePasswordEventHandler> has been specified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.OnValidatingPassword%2A>虛擬方法會使用於<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A>方法來引發<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>事件如果<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipValidatePasswordEventHandler>尚未指定。

trans-unit.source: The `e` parameter is used to pass a <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs> object to the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipValidatePasswordEventHandler> event handler.
trans-unit.target: `e`參數用來傳遞<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs>物件<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipValidatePasswordEventHandler>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event has completed, the properties of the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs> object supplied as the `e` parameter can be examined to determine whether the current action should be canceled and if a particular <xref:System.Exception>, stored in the <xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A> property, should be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>事件完成後，屬性<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs>物件提供作為`e`參數可加以檢查來判斷是否應該取消目前的動作，以及特定<xref:System.Exception>中預存<xref:System.Web.Security.ValidatePasswordEventArgs.FailureInformation%2A>屬性，應該擲回。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of minutes in which a maximum number of invalid password or password-answer attempts are allowed before the membership user is locked out.
trans-unit.target: 取得鎖定成員資格使用者以前，所允許的無效密碼或密碼解答嘗試次數上限的分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: The number of minutes in which a maximum number of invalid password or password-answer attempts are allowed before the membership user is locked out.
trans-unit.target: 鎖定成員資格使用者以前，所允許的無效密碼或密碼解答嘗試次數上限的分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A> property works in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> property to guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A>屬性可搭配<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>屬性，以防範不必要的來源，破解的密碼或密碼解答的成員資格使用者，透過重複嘗試。

trans-unit.source: If the number of invalid passwords or password questions supplied for a membership user exceeds the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> within the number of minutes identified by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A>, then the membership user is locked out by setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A> property to `true` until the user is unlocked by a call to the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UnlockUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果不正確的密碼或提供成員資格使用者的密碼問題數目超過<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>所識別的分鐘數內<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A>，然後藉由設定鎖定成員資格使用者<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>屬性`true`直到呼叫解除鎖定使用者<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UnlockUser%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If a valid password or password answer is supplied before the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> is reached, the counter that tracks the number of invalid attempts is reset to zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果之前提供有效的密碼或密碼解答<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>會達到，追蹤無效嘗試次數的計數器就會重設為零。

trans-unit.source: Invalid password and password-answer attempts accumulate independently of one another.
trans-unit.target: 無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試累積彼此獨立。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A> property is set to 5, and three invalid password attempts are made followed by two invalid password-answer attempts, two more invalid password attempts (or three more invalid password-answer attempts) must be made within the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A> value for the membership user to be locked out.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts%2A>屬性設定為 5，而且後面接著兩個無效的密碼解答嘗試進行三個無效的密碼嘗試次數，內，則必須進行兩個的多個無效的密碼嘗試次數（或三個的多個無效的密碼解答嘗試）<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordAttemptWindow%2A>被鎖定成員資格使用者的值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A> property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A>屬性設定為`false`，不會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試。

trans-unit.source: Invalid password and password-answer attempts are tracked in the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePasswordQuestionAndAnswer%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 在中，追蹤無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePasswordQuestionAndAnswer%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the format for storing passwords in the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示將密碼儲存在成員資格資料存放區中的格式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordFormat" /> values indicating the format for storing passwords in the data store.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordFormat" /> 值，這個值表示將密碼儲存在資料存放區中的格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.PasswordFormat%2A> property indicates the format that passwords are stored in.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.PasswordFormat%2A>屬性表示密碼會以儲存的格式。

trans-unit.source: Use `Hashed` only, `Clear` and `Encrypted` are not secure.
trans-unit.target: 使用`Hashed`僅`Clear`和`Encrypted`並未受到保護。

trans-unit.source: `Hashed` passwords are hashed using a one-way hash algorithm and a randomly generated salt value when stored in the database.
trans-unit.target: `Hashed` 密碼已雜湊使用單向雜湊演算法和隨機產生的 salt 值儲存在資料庫中。

trans-unit.source: When a password is validated, it is hashed with the salt value in the database for verification.
trans-unit.target: 驗證密碼時，它會將雜湊驗證的資料庫中的 salt 值。

trans-unit.source: Hashed passwords cannot be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 無法擷取雜湊的密碼。

trans-unit.source: `Encrypted` passwords are not considered safe, as a breach that reveals your database contents can also expose the encryption key.
trans-unit.target: `Encrypted` 密碼不安全的因為的缺口都可顯示您的資料庫內容，也可以公開加密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: This means your encrypted passwords could be decrypted and exposed.
trans-unit.target: 這表示可以解密加密的密碼，並且公開。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EncryptPassword%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.DecryptPassword%2A> virtual methods of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> class to encrypt and decrypt password values, or you can supply your own encryption code.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EncryptPassword%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.DecryptPassword%2A>虛擬方法的<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>類別來加密和解密的密碼值，或者您可以提供您自己的加密程式碼。

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EncryptPassword%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.DecryptPassword%2A> virtual methods of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> class, `Encrypted` passwords are encrypted using the key information supplied in the [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46) element in your configuration.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EncryptPassword%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.DecryptPassword%2A>虛擬方法的<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>類別`Encrypted`密碼使用所提供的金鑰資訊加密[machineKey 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46)您可以在組態項目。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the regular expression used to evaluate a password.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來評估密碼的規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression used to evaluate a password.
trans-unit.target: 用來評估密碼的規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> property gets the regular expression used to evaluate password complexity for the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>屬性會取得用來評估密碼複雜度的規則運算式<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> property is set in the application configuration using the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>屬性設定在應用程式組態中，使用`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)組態項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)中的組態項目`system.web`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: It specifies that the application use an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> class to provide membership services, and sets the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute to a regular expression that validates that the password meets the following criteria:
trans-unit.target: 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>類別提供成員資格服務與集`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`屬性驗證的密碼是否符合下列條件的規則運算式：

trans-unit.source: Is greater than seven characters.
trans-unit.target: Is greater than 七個字元。

trans-unit.source: Contains at least one digit.
trans-unit.target: 包含至少一個數字。

trans-unit.source: Contains at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character.
trans-unit.target: 包含至少一個特殊的 （非英數） 字元。

trans-unit.source: If the password does not meet these criteria, the password is not accepted by the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 如果密碼不符合這些準則，成員資格提供者不接受的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the membership provider is configured to require the user to answer a password question for password reset and retrieval.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出將成員資格提供者設定為要求使用者回答密碼問題，以便重設密碼和擷取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a password answer is required for password reset and retrieval; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果密碼重設及擷取需要密碼解答，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value specified in the configuration file (Web.config).
trans-unit.target: 組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的布林值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A> property indicates whether users must supply a password answer in order to retrieve their password using the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A> method, or reset their password using the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A>屬性會指出使用者是否必須提供密碼解答才能擷取其密碼使用<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.GetPassword%2A>方法，或重設其密碼使用<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the membership provider is configured to require a unique email address for each user name.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示成員資格提供者是否設定成需要每個使用者名稱有唯一的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the membership provider requires a unique email address; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果成員資格提供者需要唯一的電子郵件地址;否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.RequiresUniqueEmail%2A> property indicates whether users must supply a unique email address value when creating a user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.RequiresUniqueEmail%2A>屬性會指出使用者是否必須在建立使用者時提供唯一的電子郵件位址值。

trans-unit.source: If a user already exists in the data source for the current <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ApplicationName%2A>, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method returns `null` and a status value of <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus.DuplicateEmail>.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者已存在於目前的資料來源<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ApplicationName%2A>，然後在<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>方法會傳回`null`和 status 值為<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus.DuplicateEmail>。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: The user to reset the password for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其重設密碼的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The password answer for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 指定之使用者的密碼解答。

trans-unit.source: Resets a user's password to a new, automatically generated password.
trans-unit.target: 將使用者的密碼重設為自動產生的新密碼。

trans-unit.source: The new password for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 指定之使用者的新密碼。

trans-unit.source: Takes, as input, a user name and a password answer and generates a new, random password for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 接受輸入使用者名稱和密碼解答，並產生新的隨機密碼，以指定的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The random password created by the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> method is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression in the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 所建立的隨機密碼<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A>方法不保證傳遞規則運算式中的<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, the random password will meet the criteria established by the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A> properties
trans-unit.target: 不過，隨機密碼將會符合所建立的準則<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>屬性

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> method updates the user information in the data source with the new password value and returns the new password as a string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A>方法使用新的密碼值更新資料來源中的使用者資訊，並傳回新的密碼做為字串。

trans-unit.source: A convenient mechanism for generating a random password is the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.GeneratePassword%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 是一個方便的機制，來產生隨機密碼<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.GeneratePassword%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> ensures that the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EnablePasswordReset%2A> flag is set to `true` before performing any action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> 可確保<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EnablePasswordReset%2A>旗標設為`true`然後再執行任何動作。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EnablePasswordReset%2A> is `false`, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.EnablePasswordReset%2A>是`false`、<xref:System.NotSupportedException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> also checks the value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> 也會檢查值<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> checks the value of the supplied answer parameter against the stored password answer in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.RequiresQuestionAndAnswer%2A>是`true`，<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A>會檢查提供的回應參數與資料來源中的預存的密碼解答的值。

trans-unit.source: If they do not match, a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果不相符，<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: The membership user whose lock status you want to clear.
trans-unit.target: 您想要清除其鎖定狀態的具成員資格使用者。

trans-unit.source: Clears a lock so that the membership user can be validated.
trans-unit.target: 清除鎖定，以驗證使用者的成員資格。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the membership user was successfully unlocked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功解除鎖定成員資格使用者，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Takes, as input, a user name, and updates the field in the data source that stores the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 做為輸入，採用使用者名稱，並更新儲存之資料來源中的欄位<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.UnlockUser%2A> method returns `true` if the record for the membership user is updated successfully; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.UnlockUser%2A>方法會傳回`true`記錄是否為成員資格使用者已更新成功，否則`false`。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> object that represents the user to update and the updated information for the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser" /> 物件，表示要更新的使用者，以及該使用者的已更新資訊。

trans-unit.source: Updates information about a user in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 更新資料來源中的使用者相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Takes, as input, a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> object populated with user information and updates the data source with the supplied values.
trans-unit.target: 做為輸入，會採用<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>物件填入 使用者資訊和提供的值，以更新資料來源。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the user to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The password for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 指定之使用者的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the specified user name and password exist in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 確認資料來源中存在指定的使用者名稱和密碼。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified username and password are valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的使用者名稱和密碼有效，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Takes, as input, a user name and a password and verifies that the values match those in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 接受輸入使用者名稱和密碼，並確認值相符的資料來源中。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> returns `true` for a successful user name and password match; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> 傳回`true`成功的使用者名稱和密碼相符項目; 否則`false`。

trans-unit.source: For successful validations, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> updates the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 成功驗證，如<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>更新<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>為指定的使用者。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user is created, a password is changed, or a password is reset.
trans-unit.target: 當建立使用者、變更密碼或重設密碼時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>期間引發事件<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ChangePassword%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ResetPassword%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event occurs before the action requested and enables the user to continue or cancel the requested action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>事件發生之前要求的動作，讓使用者繼續或取消要求的動作。

trans-unit.source: If the action is canceled, the user can specify an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果取消動作，使用者可以指定擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Users use a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipValidatePasswordEventHandler> event handler to specify a handler for the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event.
trans-unit.target: 使用者使用<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipValidatePasswordEventHandler>事件處理常式加入指定的處理常式<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>事件。

trans-unit.source: Provider implementers can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.OnValidatingPassword%2A> virtual method to raise the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供者實作器可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.OnValidatingPassword%2A>虛擬方法，以引發<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidatingPassword>事件。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
trans-unit.target: 如需<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>實作中，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。
